app_description: AI analyzes your face to find your mythological match
characters_subtitle: Explore {count} mythological figures from around the world
characters_empty: No figures found in this category.
upload_subtitle: Find the deity that mirrors your essence
upload_privacy: Uploaded images are deleted immediately after analysis
analyzing_message: Searching for your essence in the realm of gods
result_select_character: Select a character to create your fusion!
creating_fusion_msg: Merging your essence with the mythical...
error_no_face: No face detected. Please try another photo.
error_generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error_timeout: Analysis timed out. Please try again.
error_ad_required: Please watch an ad to continue using the service.
ad_modal_message: You've used your free analysis. Watch a short ad to unlock another analysis.
ad_modal_complete: Ad Complete! You can now continue.
privacy_section1_content: MythFace ("Service") processes personal information for the following purposes:
privacy_section1_item1: Service Provision: Face analysis and mythological character matching
privacy_section2_item1: Required: Uploaded face images (processed temporarily and deleted immediately)
privacy_section2_item2: For inquiries: Email address, inquiry content
privacy_section2_item3: Automatically collected: IP address, browser information, access time
privacy_section3_item1: Face images: Deleted immediately after analysis (not stored on server)
privacy_section3_item2: Inquiry content: Retained for 3 years after resolution
privacy_section4_content: We do not share your personal information with third parties without your prior consent.
terms_section1_content: These Terms of Service govern your use of MythFace ("Service"), a face analysis and mythological character matching web service.
terms_section2_item1: Face image analysis and mythological character matching
terms_section3_item1: Upload photos of others without permission
terms_section3_item3: Use the service for illegal purposes
terms_section3_item4: Commercially exploit service results without permission
terms_section4_item1: The Service is provided free of charge and "as is"
terms_section4_item2: Analysis results are for entertainment purposes only
terms_section4_item3: Users are responsible for image copyright and portrait rights
contact_subtitle: If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us using the form below.
contact_success: Your message has been sent successfully. We will respond as soon as possible.
contact_error: An error occurred. Please contact us directly via email.
contact_direct_email: Or you can email us directly:
